item.title: Version 1.119.0
item.description:
üéâ macOS 26 (Sequoia) Compatibility Release

This release primarily focuses on fixing critical crashes and compatibility issues on macOS 26 (Sequoia) and newer versions.

üêõ Critical Bug Fixes

  • ‚úÖ Fixed critical startup crash on macOS 26 (Sequoia)
  • Removed background colors from proxy list menu items
  • Fixed menu item click crashes

‚ú® Improvements

  • Enabled auto-update with GitHub Pages
  • Added Applications folder symlink to DMG for easy installation

‚ö†Ô∏è Important Notice

All macOS 26 (Sequoia) users must update to this version to avoid crashes and ensure proper functionality.
